name: Metroid v-ANT-ia
description:
Description: A game about a ant who needs to save the eggs left in the hill after you were abandoned 

Controles:

A-D = To move

Q = To shoot, unlocked by collecting the egg with a yellow star, can break smuldering blocks.

Space = To jump, allows flight when the egg with a green star has been collected.

Shift = To dash, you are invincible when dashing, unlocked by collecting the egg with a blue star.

Lore: You play as a ant which has been abandeond by the rest of the ants, when the ant hill was flooded. Now you are tasked with saving the eggs left together with you in the hill.

Theme: you don't have lives but have to do the hole thing in "1 shot"!

Ps: Write your lowest time in the comments.

Ps Ps: this is my first trijam, and i think it wen't pretty well, for a first time.
